reviewText: This is a funny, dubbed into English, Japanese Game Show.  It's a good "Guys" program as it's a no-brainer comedy show with no social redemption. It can also be seen on Spike TV.
Title: N/A

reviewText: Probably one the greatest shows of all time has got to be MXC. I just love watching show after show of this. I really liked the the English dubbed better than the Japanese language version. I mean in the English dubbed version, they make all this humorous sounds and silly pharses, as well as replaying almost everybodies screw ups. Then there's the Japanese version. They don't make good enough jokes or make the best communtary, but it's still fun to watch. I personally recommend buying this one to anyones collection, if your a diehard gameshow fan, this one is a must buy.

reviewText: If you like Japanese actions game shows and adult "left-winged" comedy, this show is a fun mixture of both! It is totally worth buying! I have yet to get sick of my copy and I've owned it now for a few years!

reviewText: I love love LOVE the show. I would give it four stars, but the case I got was all busted up... guess MXC doesn't get the love it really deserves from everyone...Anyway, check this out if you haven't already. If you like goofy humor, this is for you.

reviewText: An absolute classic, nothing ever gets old with watching people getting hurt while trying to have fun!  This was a Spike TV classic!  My kids really get a kick out of it.
